{"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT actor.actor_id AS actor_, actor.first_name AS first_name, actor.last_name AS last_name, actor.last_update AS last_update, film_actor.actor_id AS actor_id, film_actor.film_id AS film_id, film_actor.last_update AS last_update2  FROM (sakila.actor actor  INNER JOIN sakila.film_actor film_actor ON (actor.actor_id  = film_actor.actor_id ))

WHERE (  film_actor.actor_id < 150

AND   film_actor.actor_id in (1,2,3)

AND   film_actor.last_update < STR_TO_DATE('2023-12-26', '%Y-%m-%d') )","active":"Yes","threshold":"0","schemaName":"sakila","dataQuery":"select count(*) from sakila.film_actor","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"actor_id","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","operation":"<","workSchemaId":"8342"}

{"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT actor.actor_id AS actor_id, actor.first_name AS first_name, actor.last_name AS last_name, actor.last_update AS last_update  FROM sakila.actor actor WHERE (  actor.actor_id > 100 ) ","active":"Yes","threshold":"60","schemaName":"sakila","dataQuery":"select count(*) from sakila.actor","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"actor_id","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"% of bad records is","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"40","name":"SQL query","easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":"{\"modified\":true,\"query\":{\"modelId\":\"32a1ca90-197b-4291-823e-2301b017624c\",\"modelName\":null,\"id\":\"quer-ke8he9nabk\",\"name\":\"[New query]\",\"cols\":[{\"id\":\"col-838hezxse8\",\"cptn\":\"actor_id\",\"expr\":{\"tag\":2,\"dtype\":7,\"id\":\"actor.actor_id\",\"val\":\"actor.actor_id\"}},{\"id\":\"col-8k8hezxse8\",\"cptn\":\"first_name\",\"expr\":{\"tag\":2,\"dtype\":1,\"id\":\"actor.first_name\",\"val\":\"actor.first_name\"}},{\"id\":\"col-x58hezy074\",\"cptn\":\"last_name\",\"expr\":{\"tag\":2,\"dtype\":1,\"id\":\"actor.last_name\",\"val\":\"actor.last_name\"}},{\"id\":\"col-mf8hezy074\",\"cptn\":\"last_update\",\"expr\":{\"tag\":2,\"dtype\":12,\"id\":\"actor.last_update\",\"val\":\"actor.last_update\"}}],\"justsortcols\":[],\"extraData\":{},\"innerData\":{\"aggr\":{\"groups\":[],\"ugt\":false,\"urc\":false,\"csg\":false,\"aggregates\":[],\"enabled\":false}},\"root\":{\"tag\":51,\"linking\":3,\"conds\":[{\"tag\":1,\"op\":\"GreaterThan\",\"exprs\":[{\"tag\":2,\"dtype\":7,\"id\":\"actor.actor_id\",\"val\":\"actor.actor_id\"},{\"tag\":1,\"dtype\":7,\"kind\":0,\"val\":\"100\",\"txt\":\"100\"}]}]},\"extraConds\":{\"tag\":51,\"linking\":3,\"conds\":[]},\"timezoneOffset\":-330,\"locale\":\"en-US\"}}","comparisonQuery":""},"id":"","operation":"<","workSchemaId":"8342"}
